title: Serpenta NFT Collection
description: 5555 Genesis Dragon NFT heroes enter the Void for the Dragon Army! What unique powers will you emerge with?

roadmapOne.title: WHAT IS SERPENTA NFT?
roadmapOne.body: An NFT adventure where your chosen Dragons battle through unknown worlds beyond the dimensional portal known as the Great Void! 5555 Genesis Dragons have been conscripted and undergone harsh training before venturing into the mysterious portals. Escape from your shackles and discover new traits, outfits and artifacts that uniquely show off your personality and power! Serpenta is a fantastic Web3 P2E journey and game experience combining NFT pixel art, anime and on-chain storytelling!

roadmapTwo.title: What's Coming
roadmapTwo.body:
Exceptionally detailed and desirable NFT Pixel Art avatars that grow and accumulate more treasure with each Void mission. Find out who, or what is behind the Great Void excursions and decide which clan factions you align with. Experience on-chain idle encounters and find ultra-rare drops through the actions and exploits of your Dragons! 

 The Serpenta Brand is working with anime artists to provide ultra-limited, rare art drops to holders, Tokyo streetwear partnerships, membership benefits on top of the expanded AFK/Idle games, staking currency through crypto defi and many other community profit-sharing opportunities. Ultimately, you will decide on the hybrid breeding of the next Dragon generation and expose the secret behind unveiling your very own Anime Waifu Navigator.

roadmapThree.title: Serpenta Journey
roadmapThree.body: We have great things planned for all our Serpenta stakers. New designs, evolving mechanics, non-pixel, desirable anime girlfriends and exclusive collaborations with Japanese creators are just the tip of this iceberg.

faq.answerOne: 5555 Genesis Dragons are vigorously training and will reveal themselves after the mint/launch date. Get whitelisted early to be able to mint your dragons before the public reveal. Public access will be granted to all once after the whitelisted members have minted their dragon. Every wallet will be able to mint up to 2 dragons. Follow our twitter and discord for the latest news as we release it.
faq.questionTwo: What will the mint price be?
faq.answerTwo: The initial sale price for a Serpenta Dragon will be REDACTED ETH, +some ETH for the gas fee.
faq.questionThree: How do I buy a Serpenta Dragon?
faq.answerThree: During the whitelist or public mint periods you can visit the Serpenta mint page from our homepage and buy one of our limited unrevealed NFTs after launch. Once the mint phase has sold out, you will be able to acquire a Dragon directly on OpenSea, the NFT marketplace. We recommend using the Metamask extension for Chrome for payment and a Crypto exchange for initial funding. You will need Ethereum in your Metamask wallet for the mint.
faq.answerFour: There will be a total of 5555 Serpenta Genesis Dragons.
faq.answerFive: Feel free to ask us questions on Twitter or direct them to our community in our Discord. Everyone is super friendly!

stageOne.text: Surviving your first excursion in the Void as a newbie recruit is tough! Training with the Dragon Army Elites can prepare you for your first visit - but who knows what worlds you will find or what traits you will absorb?

stageTwo.text: Choose your own path - Rebel, or Imperial? The Army wants you to carry out their missions - Look deep within yourself and enhance your Dragon's strengths. What new treasures and journeys will you discover as you challenge the Void?

stageThree.text: The Five primary Dragon Clans scheme to expand their influence. Not all is as it seems - why is the High Council creating a new generation of hybrid Dragonlings and how will they change the balance of power?

stageFour.text: The Great Void investigations continue and stories and tales continue to be told. Chaos lurks within and only the strongest teams can work together to defeat the unexpected hordes that start to break out. Great artists ink and capture the personalities of your future companions.

members.name: Pine
members.title: creative designer
members.description: Our creative lead, a prolific and successful collector of fine digital antiquities, a respected member in many communities and a determined proponent of the hard work behind the business grind and hustle.

members.name: Miaoux
members.title: marketing, biz-dev
members.description: Storyteller and geek polymath specialising in growth and logistics. Serial builder of multi-million dollar companies. He's channeling his seasoned expertise in business, NFTs and crypto to benefit Serpenta.

members.name: Remo
members.title: Designer
members.description: Bringing the dragons to vibrant life is our inspired indie artist. He joined our talented team many moons ago and astounds us with his skill daily. We are fortunate to have his visionary abilities.

members.name: Dani
members.title: solidity engineer
members.description: Our insanely skilled dev has contributed to a more efficient ERC721A and written many more ethereum contracts. He is in constant demand from developers for his solidity expertise. We are in safe hands.
